pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, January 18, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Sherbrooke, Quebec

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Closed to media.

3:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Sherbrooke C Room
Delta Sherbrooke
2685, rue King Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Open to accredited media only
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Loisirs Saint-Joseph
950, rue Desranleau Est

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
    • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
